TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Binding extends System.Web.Services.Description.NamedItem

Docs.summary: Specifies the concrete data format and protocols used in the XML Web service. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `Binding` class corresponds to the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `<binding>` element enclosed by the root `<definitions>` element. For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
## Examples The following example demonstrates a typical use of the `Binding` class.
